Works as described, valid until early 2018.

I read some comments before installing, and people were saying how none of the serials worked.  So I used the default serial that was already in place, and installed the trial, without restart.  When the updates had finished, I went to help>activate and used the second serial, THEN restarted, and everything works dandy now.

I was using avast, which I got from tpb, until it recognized itself as an illegal copy.  Don't be surprised if this happens to this and other virus programs you get from here.
